backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing investment tracking with user profiles, investments, transactions, and session state management. Includes authorization mixin, migration support, and methods for creating/querying investments and transactions with new fields (eProject, mode, txnIdNat, txnIdText).
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old Investment records to new format by adding mode, txnIdNat, and txnIdText fields with default values.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features in InvestmentForm: e-project dropdown (38 options), mode select (4 options), transaction ID fields (numeric and text), and payment notice section with UPI/WhatsApp/Ethereum details.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components (Dashboard, InvestmentForm, TransactionForm with extended payment modes and transaction IDs), hooks, configuration, and styling with warm amber/orange color scheme.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind directives and OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode variables using neutral grayscale tones for background, foreground, borders, and UI elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the Investment Tracker application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component with TanStack Router setup, authentication flow with loading states, profile setup handling, and Layout wrapper with Header/Footer for three routes: index (Dashboard), investments list, and transactions list.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard displaying user profile, statistics cards (investments, transactions, session buffer), Integrity & Session State section for investors showing session buffer and latest SessionState, investment form, and recent investments grid.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright notice with current year and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters based on hostname.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component displaying app branding, user profile with role badge, and navigation buttons for Dashboard, Investments, and Transactions pages, plus a login button.
frontend/src/components/InvestmentCard.t: Card component for displaying individual investment details with tabs for overview (total transactions, creation date) and transaction list, includes dialog for adding new transactions.
frontend/src/components/InvestmentForm.t: Form component for creating new investments with fields for name, description, e-project selection (from predefined list), payment mode, and transaction IDs (numeric and optional text).
Displays a grid of all investments in the platform with investment ID, investor principal, and creation timestamp; shows loading state and empty state.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button that handles Internet Identity login/logout, updates session hashes for investors on logout, and manages query cache invalidation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation form for new users to enter name, email, and select role (Admin or Investor) before accessing the application.
Form for creating transactions with amount, type (recharge/withdrawal), payment mode selection, transaction IDs, and session management; includes confirmation dialog before submission.
Displays a scrollable list of transactions for a specific investment with icons, badges, and detailed metadata including nonce, session sequence, and transaction IDs.
frontend/src/components/TransactionsList: Renders a comprehensive table view of all caller transactions with formatted dates, transaction types, amounts, and detailed metadata columns.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality with AuthClient integration and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, investments, transactions, and session state with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme color schemes including sidebar, charts, and UI component tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, font families (Inter, JetBrains Mono), container settings, border radius variables, and keyframe animations for accordions.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document describing an investment platform with enhanced create investment form supporting multiple payment modes (GPay, Crypto, CBDC, Wallets), e-project selection dropdown, transaction ID fields, and payment notice section with UPI/WhatsApp/ETH details.
